alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 10:18AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Los Angeles County through 1045 AM PDT... At 1017 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over La Habra, or near Whittier, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Whittier, West Covina, Glendora, San Dimas, Diamond Bar, Hacienda Heights Pico Rivera, Santa Fe Springs, Baldwin Park, La Habra Heights, La Puente, Walnut and La Mirada. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley
